TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(object sender, XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(sender As Object, e As XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs)
public delegate void XsltMessageEncounteredEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, XsltMessageEncounteredEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il evento si verifica durante l'elaborazione XSLT quando un `xsl:message` è specificato nel foglio di stile.The event occurs during XSLT processing when an `xsl:message` is specified in the style sheet. Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [la gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
